meanings.definition: The art or skill of living well.
meanings.sent1: Learning lifemanships helps us make good choices in life.
meanings.sent2: She studied lifemanships to improve her overall well-being.
meanings.sent3: Practicing lifemanships is like painting a beautiful picture of your life.
meanings.sent4: Her lifemanships shone brightly, guiding others through the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The essence of lifemanships lies in finding joy in everyday moments.

meanings.definition: The practice or ability to navigate life effectively.
meanings.sent1: His lifemanships allowed him to overcome many challenges.
meanings.sent2: Navigating through tough times requires strong lifemanships.
meanings.sent3: Trying to master lifemanships is like solving a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent4: In the journey of life, lifemanships act as a reliable compass.
meanings.sent5: She honed her lifemanships through years of experience and learning.
